# Eye

```lua
local SIZE = 512
local PIX = 32
local BLOCK = SIZE / PIX

-- Paleta básica
local COLORS = {
    BG       = {30, 30, 40},
    YELLOW   = {255, 204, 0},
    DARK     = {210, 165, 0},
    BLACK    = {0, 0, 0},
    WHITE    = {255, 255, 255},
    PINK     = {255, 140, 140}
}

-- Sprite de Jake (32x32)
-- 0 = fondo
-- 1 = amarillo, 
-- 2 = contorno oscuro
-- 3 = blanco 
-- 4 = negro
-- 5 = rosado
-- (diseño simplificado tipo emoji Jake)
local sprite = {
"00000000000000000000000000000000",
"00000000000022222200000000000000",
"00000000222111111122200000000000",
"00000022111111111111122000000000",
"00002211111111111111111220000000",
"00021111111111111111111112000000",
"00211111111111111111111111200000",
"02111111111111111111111111120000",
"02111111111333333311111111112000",
"21111111113333333333111111111200",
"21111111113334443333111111111200",
"21111111113334443333111111111200",
"21111111113333333333111111111200",
"21111111111333333311111111111200",
"02111111111111111111111111112000",
"02111111111111111111111111120000",
"00211111111111111111111111200000",
"00021111111115555111111112000000",
"00002211111115555111111220000000",
"00000221111111111111112200000000",
"00000002221111111112220000000000",
"00000000002222222222000000000000",
"00000000000022222200000000000000",
"00000000000000000000000000000000",
"00000000000000000000000000000000",
"00000000000000000000000000000000",
"00000000000000000000000000000000",
"00000000000000000000000000000000",
"00000000000000000000000000000000",
"00000000000000000000000000000000",
"00000000000000000000000000000000",
"00000000000000000000000000000000"
}

-- función auxiliar para pintar bloques
local function fill_block(x, y, color)
    for i = 0, BLOCK-1 do
        for j = 0, BLOCK-1 do
        grid:set_pixel(x + i, y + j, color[1], color[2], color[3])
        
        
        end
    
    
    end

end

-- dibujar el sprite escalado
for sy = 1, #sprite do
    local row = sprite[sy]
    for sx = 1, #row do
        local ch = string.sub(row, sx, sx)
        local color
        if ch == "0" then color = COLORS.BG
        elseif ch == "1" then color = COLORS.YELLOW
        elseif ch == "2" then color = COLORS.DARK
        elseif ch == "3" then color = COLORS.WHITE
        elseif ch == "4" then color = COLORS.BLACK
        elseif ch == "5" then color = COLORS.PINK
        end
        fill_block((sx-1)*BLOCK, (sy-1)*BLOCK, color)
    end
end
```
